headline: Is e.l.f. Beauty (ELF) Recasting Its Global Strategy With Matthew Farrell Joining the Board?
summary: Earlier this month, e.l.f. Beauty appointed former Church & Dwight chief executive Matthew Farrell to its board as a Class I director, adding extensive consumer and finance experience ahead of his election at the 2026 annual meeting. This appointment comes as e.l.f. Beauty is integrating its Rhode acquisition and pursuing broad international expansion, potentially benefiting from Farrell’s background in global consumer brands, supply chains, and multi-brand portfolios. With Farrell joining...

headline: Condom Market Report 2026-2035: A $22.57 Billion Industry by 2030 with Reckitt Benckiser, Church & Dwight, Humanwell Healthcare, Okamoto Industries, Mankind Pharma, Karex Berhad Leading
summary: The condom market is set to grow rapidly due to increased sexual health awareness, expansion of e-commerce, and demand for eco-friendly materials and specialty products. Key trends include non-latex alternatives, enhanced safety, and online sales growth, with Asia-Pacific leading regional expansion.
